Test.Name: FallocateNormalAlloc
Test.Description: fallocate() allocates and initializes to zero the disk space within the range specified by offset and len.

Test.Name: FallocateNormalPunchHole
Test.Description: Specifying the FALLOC_FL_PUNCH_HOLE flag in mode deallocates space (i.e., creates a hole) in the byte range starting at offset and continuing for len bytes
